channel.title: Some options not saving
channel.description: Some of the options under the "Black Mesa" tab in the options window are not saving properly. The ones I noticed while playing were auto-aim and view roll, which reset to on every time I restarted the game even though I turned them off every time. There may be others but I didn't change most of the options.

item.title: Some options not saving
item.dc:creator: nimbulan
item.description:
Some of the options under the “Black Mesa” tab in the options window are not saving properly. The ones I noticed while playing were auto-aim and view roll, which reset to on every time I restarted the game even though I turned them off every time. There may be others but I didn’t change most of the options.

Read full topic
